allow: Bash(duckdb data/p3.duckdb "SELECT id, COUNT(*) as count FROM episodes GROUP BY id HAVING count > 1 LIMIT 10;")
Bash(duckdb data/p3.duckdb "SELECT MAX(id) as max_id FROM episodes;")
Bash(duckdb data/p3.duckdb "SELECT id, title, status FROM episodes WHERE id >= 420 ORDER BY id;")
Bash(duckdb data/p3.duckdb "SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM episodes;")
Bash(duckdb data/p3.duckdb "SELECT id FROM episodes WHERE id > 415 ORDER BY id;")
Bash(duckdb data/p3.duckdb "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_episodes, MAX(id) as max_id FROM episodes; SELECT nextval(''episode_id_seq'') as next_id;")
Bash(timeout 30 sh -c 'while ! tail -n 20 2>&1; do sleep 1; done')
SlashCommand(/sc:task Issue 12 CLI Integration Implementation - Set up package structure and implement all commands)
